A question! a question! I have waited an eternity for a question	(Star 
Trek First series...)

This is a tea jar, stylized nonetheless but a tea jar all the same. 
Essential for the tea ceremony. Because it looks like the fruit of the 
Jujube (natsume), it is called a natsume...
-t
